Room.Name: A Crescent-Shaped Beach
Room.Description: A beautiful beach, forming the shape of a crescent moon, stretches out from the edge of the woods. Deep, red sand lends an air of relaxation to this utopian setting. The water, in sharp contrast, to the sand, starts out as a brilliant green, then turns to a beautiful shade of turquoise all the way to the horizon. A few islands can be seen far into the distance.

Room.Name: A Crescent-Shaped Beach
Room.Description: Extending out in the shape of a crescent-moon, the beach is a perfect paradise. It gives off the appearance of twilight no matter the time of day, as deep, red sand stretches from one end to the other. A few palm trees dapple the shoreline, adding to the breathtaking beauty of the place. Some small islands can be seen off in the horizon.

Room.Name: A Crescent-Shaped Beach
Room.Description: Extending out in the shape of a crescent-moon, the beach is a perfect paradise. It gives off the appearance of twilight no matter the time of day, as deep, red sand stretches from one end to the other. A few palm trees dapple the shoreline, adding to the breathtaking beauty of the place. Some small islands can be seen off in the horizon.

Room.Name: A Crescent-Shaped Beach
Room.Description: A beautiful beach, forming the shape of a crescent moon, stretches out from the edge of the woods. Deep, red sand lends an air of relaxation to this utopian setting. The water, in sharp contrast, to the sand, starts out as a brilliant green, then turns to a beautiful shade of turquoise all the way to the horizon. A few islands can be seen far into the distance.

Room.Name: The Shallows
Room.Description: Brilliant, green water breaks gently off the shoreline. Here and there, small fish can be seen darting in and out among the waves in what appears to be a playful manner. Far off in the distance, a seagull is heard calling to its mate.

Room.Name: The Shallows
Room.Description: The soothing sound of the surf can clearly be heard as beautiful, clear, green water rushes back and forth to the shore, creating complex patterns in the sand below. Sunlight dances off the cresting waves, creating a dazzling display of sparkles.

Room.Name: The Shallows
Room.Description: Brilliant, green water breaks gently off the shoreline. Here and there, small fish can be seen darting in and out among the waves in what appears to be a playful manner. Far off in the distance, a seagull is heard calling to its mate.

Room.Name: The Shallows
Room.Description: The soothing sound of the surf can clearly be heard as beautiful, clear, green water rushes back and forth to the shore, creating complex patterns in the sand below. Sunlight dances off the cresting waves, creating a dazzling display of sparkles.

Room.Name: The Shallows
Room.Description: Brilliant, green water breaks gently off the shoreline. Here and there, small fish can be seen darting in and out among the waves in what appears to be a playful manner. Far off in the distance, a seagull is heard calling to its mate.

Room.Name: Sandbar
Room.Description: A large sandbar runs parallel to the beach. The normally clear water is murky here as waves break violently across it trying to reach the shoreline. No life teems beneath these rough, cloudy depths.

Room.Name: Sandbar
Room.Description: No life can be seen here, as the water hurtles across the sandbar in protest to being denied easy access to the shore. A piece of seaweed gets tossed violently about, caught in the endless currents ripping back and forth.

Room.Name: Sandbar
Room.Description: A large sandbar runs parallel to the beach. The normally clear water is murky here as waves break violently across it trying to reach the shoreline. No life teems beneath these rough, cloudy depths.

Room.Name: A Coral Reef
Room.Description: Clear, turquoise water houses a spectacular variety of exotic, colorful fish living on a magnificent reef. The reef is composed of various hues of coral, sea fans and seaweed. Numerous species of sea urchins and starfish cling to the coral, waiting for food to drift close. Crabs can be seen scurrying about, trying to avoid predators.

Room.Name: A Coral Reef
Room.Description: Hundreds of different species of fish drift across the reef, their painted bodies blending together with the corals and sea fans to create a glorious kalidescope of swirling colors. Tiny seahorses cling to seaweed, drifting back and forth with the tides. A large stingray skims across the top of the reef, searching for its next meal.

Room.Name: Sandbar
Room.Description: No life can be seen here, as the water hurtles across the sandbar in protest to being denied easy access to the shore. A piece of seaweed gets tossed violently about, caught in the endless currents ripping back and forth.

Numerous species of sea urchins and starfish cling to the coral, waiting for food to drift close. Crabs can be seen scurrying about, trying to avoid predators.

Room.Name: A Coral Reef
Room.Description: Hundreds of different species of fish drift across the reef, their painted bodies blending together with the corals and sea fans to create a glorious kalidescope of swirling colors. Tiny seahorses cling to seaweed, drifting back and forth with the tides. A large stingray skims across the top of the reef, searching for its next meal.

Room.Name: The Naiadian Sea
Room.Description: Gentle swells, no more than two feet in height, rise up and down in a gentle rythm. The water is a brilliant shade of turquoise, so crystal clear it almost seems like you can see the bottom. Here and there, small pieces of seaweed can be seen floating on the waters surface.

Room.Name: The Naiadian Sea
Room.Description: Diamond-like sparkles ripple across the turquoise water, dazzling the eyes with its brilliance. Dark shapes, large and small, can be seen darting beneath the water's surface. Some shapes are clearly distinguishable as fish, while others just appears as dark blurs moving to and fro.

Room.Name: The Naiadian Sea
Room.Description: Crystal clear, turquoise water rises gently up and down, teeming with life. A large school of fish can be seen dashing about a short distance below the surface, its sheer mass turning the water black. A large piece of seaweed drifts along the surface, bobbing up and down in the gentle waves.

Room.Name: The Naiadian Sea
Room.Description: Gentle swells, no more than two feet in height, rise up and down in a gentle rythm. The water is a brilliant shade of turquoise, so crystal clear it almost seems like you can see the bottom. Here and there, small pieces of seaweed can be seen floating on the waters surface.

Room.Name: Shallow Water
Room.Description: The soothing sound of the surf can clearly be heard as beautiful, clear, green water rushes back and forth to the shore, creating complex patterns in the sand below. Sunlight dances off the cresting waves, creating a dazzling display of sparkles.

Room.Name: Shallow Water
Room.Description: Brilliant, green water breaks gently off the shoreline. Here and there, small fish can be seen darting in and out among the waves in what appears to be a playful manner. Far off in the distance, a seagull is heard calling to its mate.

Room.Name: A Sandy Beach
Room.Description: Nestled in a small, rocky cove, this tiny beach is the only feasible access to the island. Pitch black sand is covered in sand dollars of varying shapes, washed in from the occasional storm raging across the sea. The clear, green water is placid here, protected by the jutting rocks that form the cove.

Room.Name: The Naiadian Sea
Room.Description: Gentle swells, no more than two feet in height, rise up and down in a gentle rythm. The water is a brilliant shade of turquoise, so crystal clear it almost seems like you can see the bottom. Here and there, small pieces of seaweed can be seen floating on the waters surface.

Room.Name: Shallow Water
Room.Description: The soothing sound of the surf can clearly be heard as beautiful, clear, green water rushes back and forth to the shore, creating complex patterns in the sand below. Sunlight dances off the cresting waves, creating a dazzling display of sparkles.

Room.Name: The Naiadian Sea
Room.Description: Gentle swells, no more than two feet in height, rise up and down in a gentle rythm. The water is a brilliant shade of turquoise, so crystal clear it almost seems like you can see the bottom. Here and there, small pieces of seaweed can be seen floating on the waters surface.

Room.Name: An Outcropping of Rocks
Room.Description: Massive boulders jut up out of the depths of the sea from a dormant volcano just beneath the surface. Worn smooth from thousands of years of sea water, the rocks have become a favored sun bathing spot of the merfolk, for which the sea was named. The water is a deep blue here, not even a hint of green can be detected.

Room.Name: The Naiadian Sea
Room.Description: Diamond-like sparkles ripple across the turquoise water, dazzling the eyes with its brilliance. Dark shapes, large and small, can be seen darting beneath the water's surface. Some shapes are clearly distinguishable as fish, while others just appears as dark blurs moving to and fro.

Room.Name: The Naiadian Sea
Room.Description: Diamond-like sparkles ripple across the turquoise water, dazzling the eyes with its brilliance. Dark shapes, large and small, can be seen darting beneath the water's surface. Room.Name: The Naiadian Sea
Room.Description: Crystal clear, turquoise water rises gently up and down, teeming with life. A large school of fish can be seen dashing about a short distance below the surface, its sheer mass turning the water black. A large piece of seaweed drifts along the surface, bobbing up and down in the gentle waves.

Room.Name: An Outcropping of Rocks
Room.Description: A soft, warm breeze whispers through the rocks, not even strong enough to stir up the dark blue water just barely drifting through. The rocks, worn smooth from the pressure of the water, are part of an old, dormant volcano just below the water's surface. At any given time, merfolk can be seen here, either sunbathing or gazing up at the stars.

Room.Name: An Outcropping of Rocks
Room.Description: Massive boulders jut up out of the depths of the sea from a dormant volcano just beneath the surface. Room.Name: A Bed of Kelp
Room.Description: A massive bed of seaweed drifts along with the currents, completely obliterating any view of the ocean depths. Nothing dares go near it for fear of becoming entangled.

NPC.name: sea serpent green
NPC.description: Emerald green scales glisten vibrantly in the sun as water streams the serpent's back. It looks up at you, green eyes glaring at you with intense hatred. Its body moves fluidly through the water, preparing to devour you piece by piece.
NPC.longDescription: A green sea serpent skims the waters surface looking for prey.

NPC.name: sea serpent red
NPC.description: Blood-red eyes stare demonically at you, devouring your flesh even before it prepares to attack. Crimsom scales shimmer in the sunlight, creating brilliant sparkles of red as it moves toward you, ready to rip you apart.
NPC.longDescription: A red sea serpent glides gracefully through the water.

NPC.name: merman hunter
NPC.description: He travels all through the sea in search of his bitter enemy, the sea serpent. He worries not who will live or die, only of the battle to come. If he wins, his people will be well fed for a long time, as well as being just that much safer. If he loses, then he will have died for their protection and livelihood. For him, this is the most honorable of deaths.
NPC.longDescription: A merman hunter moves silenty through the water hunting sea serpents.

NPC.name: merman guard
NPC.description: He keeps careful watch for predators, especially sea serpents, ready to give up his life to protect the mermaids. He knows they trust him explicitely, and would do anything to never let them down.
NPC.longDescription: A merman carefully guards the mermaids as they sunbathe.

NPC.name: mermaid golden
NPC.description: Lustrous golden hair floats about her body like a halo. She glances up at you, china blue eyes regarding you with mild curiousity. She smiles absently, then goes back to combing her hair as if you had never disturbed her.
NPC.longDescription: A beautiful mermaid solicitously brushes her lustrous, golden hair.

NPC.name: mermaid auburn
NPC.description: She glances distractedly at you, emerald green eyes flashing her irritation at your interupption. She tosses her head disdainfully, auburn hair blazing through the air, slaps her tail against the water, then continues her sunbathing session.
NPC.longDescription: A lovely, auburn haired mermaid floats about, soaking up the sun.

NPC.name: mermaid tawny
NPC.description: She swims lazily about, languidly stretching her body with each movement. She smiles sweetly at you, brown eyes dancing with merriment and a love of life. She tosses her tawny colored hair over her shoulder and resumes her exercises.
NPC.longDescription: A tawny haired mermaid swims effortlessly through the waves.

NPC.name: mermaid raven
NPC.description: She glances distractedly at you, violet eyes seeing nothing. Thoughts of her bethrothed fill her with longing. She twirls one raven black curl around her finger and sings a sweet song of love to herself. Faint notes drift toward you, enchanting you with their purity.
NPC.longDescription: A mermaid, raven black hair fanning about her body, sings to herself.

NPC.name: manta ray giant
NPC.description: Wings spread over 20 feet across, the manta ray glides through the water like a bird flies through the air. So fluid of motion, only the slighest ripple is created as it swims past.
NPC.longDescription: A giant manta ray can be seen gliding just below the waters surface.

NPC.name: fish school
NPC.description: A large school of mullet darts haphazardly about, trying to avoid predators. Their sheer mass blackens the water as they stay tightly bound to one another for protection.
NPC.longDescription: A school of fish blackens the water as it darts about.

NPC.name: pelican
NPC.description: The pelican scoops up water in its beak causing its pouch to sag downward. It floats lazily on the gentle waves, resting up before it begins searching for its next meal.
NPC.longDescription: A pelican rides the waves, relaxing from its last meal.

NPC.name: albatross
NPC.description: Asleep in mid air, the albatross soars effortlessly overhead, wings spread nearly ten feet wide tip to tip. It makes not even the slightest movement, simply drifts along on the air currents.
NPC.longDescription: An albatross soars through the air, wings spread wide.

Item.Name: hide green sea serpent
Item.ShortDescription: a hide from a green sea serpent
Item.LongDescription: A green hide lays balled up here.

Item.Name: rear claws green sea serpent
Item.ShortDescription: the rear claws of a green sea serpent
Item.LongDescription: A pair of claws lay here looking deadly.

Item.Name: hide red sea serpent
Item.ShortDescription: a hide of a red sea serpent
Item.LongDescription: A red hide lays balled up here.

Item.Name: front claws red sea serpent
Item.ShortDescription: the front claws of a red sea serpent
Item.LongDescription: A pair of claws lay here looking deadly.

Item.Name: arm bands golden
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of golden arm bands inscribed with a trident
Item.LongDescription: A pair of golden arm bands lays discarded in a corner.

Item.Name: trident golden
Item.LongDescription: A golden trident lays here looking menacing.

Item.Name: helm golden
Item.ShortDescription: a golden helm decorated with sea serpent horns

Item.Name: spear poison-tipped
Item.LongDescription: A thin, golden stick with a sharp, pointed end lies here.

Item.Name: comb finger coral
Item.ShortDescription: a comb made from finger coral
Item.LongDescription: A skillfully crafted comb lays half hidden here.

Item.Name: necklace blue starfish
Item.ShortDescription: a necklace made from blue starfish
Item.LongDescription: A necklace made from blue starfish lays in a crumpled heap.

Item.Name: bracelet seahorses
Item.LongDescription: A bracelet made from seahorses lies neglected in a small pile.

Item.Name: ring black pearl
Item.LongDescription: A black pearl ring lies here completely fogotten.
